entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023
